## pairwiseComparison = FALSE

### includeDMRs = TRUE, includeCpGs = FALSE

```{r}
output <- findDMRs(Mset_train450k=Mset_train450k, 
                    verbose = TRUE, gr_target=NULL, 
                    numRegions = 50, numProbes=50,
                    includeCpGs = FALSE, includeDMRs = TRUE, 
                    bumphunter_beta_cutoff = 0.2, # defined by bumphunter
                    dmr_up_cutoff = 0.5, # smaller is better
                    dmr_down_cutoff = 0.4, # smaller is better
                    dmr_pval_cutoff = 1e-11, # default of 1e-11
                    cpg_pval_cutoff = 1e-08, # default of 1e-08
                    cpg_up_dm_cutoff = 0, # ranges from -infinity to 0
                    cpg_down_dm_cutoff = 0, # ranges from 0 to infinity
                    pairwiseComparison = FALSE)
table(duplicated(output$regions)) # 
table(output$regions$cellType, output$regions$L)
table(output$regions$cellType, output$regions$status)
table(output$regions$cellType, output$regions$L, 
      output$regions$dmr_status, output$regions$status)

p1 <- as.data.frame(mcols(output$regions)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dm, y = -log(p.value),
             color = dmr_status)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-11)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-08))


p2 <- as.data.frame(mcols(output$regions)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dm, y = -log(p.value),
             color = cellType)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-11)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-08))

plot_grid(p1, p2)

mypar()
for(i in 51:60){
  output$regions[i,]
  plot(output$y[i,],col=rafalib::as.fumeric(as.character(output$cell)),main=i,ylim=c(0,1))
  abline(h=0.5); 
  legend("bottomright",output$cellLevels,col=1:6,pch=16)
  Sys.sleep(1)
}

par(mfrow=c(1,3))
image(t(output$housemanCpGs),  xaxt="n", main = "Houseman top 600 CpGs")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(output$zmat))
image(t(output$profiles),  xaxt="n", main = "DMRs")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(output$zmat))
image(t(output$zmat),  xaxt="n", main = "zmat")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(output$zmat))

p <- getBeta(Mset_train450k[, pData(Mset_train450k)$Sample_Name != "CD8+_105"] ) # beta values
target <- t(apply(as.data.frame(mcols(output$regions))[,1:2],1,function(ind){
    colMeans(p[(ind[1]):(ind[2]),,drop=FALSE]) }))
 
##quick and dirty regresion to cell counts:
estimates <- solve(crossprod(output$profiles)) %*% 
                   crossprod(output$profiles,target)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
image(estimates)

heatmap.2(t(estimates),
  main = "Cell Counts", # heat map title
  notecol="black",      # change font color of cell labels to black
  density.info="none",  # turns off density plot inside color legend
  trace="none",         # turns off trace lines inside the heat map
  col=my_palette,       # use on color palette defined earlier
  breaks=col_breaks,    # enable color transition at specified limits
  dendrogram="row",     # only draw a row dendrogram
  Colv="NA")            # turn off column clustering
```


## pairwiseComparison = TRUE


```{r}
outputPairs <- findDMRs(Mset_train450k=Mset_train450k, 
                    verbose = TRUE, gr_target=NULL, 
                    numRegions = 50, numProbes=50,
                    includeCpGs = FALSE, includeDMRs = TRUE, 
                    bumphunter_beta_cutoff = 0.2, # defined by bumphunter
                    dmr_up_cutoff = 0.5, # smaller is better
                    dmr_down_cutoff = 0.4, # smaller is better
                    dmr_pval_cutoff = 1e-11, # default of 1e-11
                    cpg_pval_cutoff = 1e-08, # default of 1e-08
                    cpg_up_dm_cutoff = 0, # ranges from -infinity to 0
                    cpg_down_dm_cutoff = 0, # ranges from 0 to infinity
                    pairwiseComparison = TRUE)
table(duplicated(outputPairs$regions)) # 
table(outputPairs$regions$cellType, outputPairs$regions$L)
table(outputPairs$regions$cellType, outputPairs$regions$status)
table(outputPairs$regions$cellType, outputPairs$regions$L, 
      outputPairs$regions$dmr_status, outputPairs$regions$status)

p1 <- as.data.frame(mcols(outputPairs$regions)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dm, y = -log(p.value),
             color = dmr_status)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-11)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-08))


p2 <- as.data.frame(mcols(outputPairs$regions)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dm, y = -log(p.value),
             color = cellType)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-11)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=-log(1e-08))

plot_grid(p1, p2)

mypar()
for(i in 101:105){
  outputPairs$regions[i,]
  plot(outputPairs$y[i,],col=rafalib::as.fumeric(as.character(outputPairs$cell)),main=i,ylim=c(0,1))
  abline(h=0.5); 
  legend("bottomright",outputPairs$cellLevels,col=1:6,pch=16)
  Sys.sleep(1)
}

par(mfrow=c(1,3))
image(t(outputPairs$housemanCpGs),  xaxt="n", main = "Houseman top 600 CpGs")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(outputPairs$zmat))
image(t(outputPairs$profiles),  xaxt="n", main = "DMRs")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(outputPairs$zmat))
image(t(outputPairs$zmat),  xaxt="n", main = "zmat")
axis(side=1, at=seq(0, 1, by =.2), labels=colnames(outputPairs$zmat))

p <- getBeta(Mset_train450k[, pData(Mset_train450k)$Sample_Name != "CD8+_105"], 
             type = "Illumina") # beta values
target <- t(apply(as.data.frame(mcols(outputPairs$regions))[,1:2],1,function(ind){
    colMeans(p[(ind[1]):(ind[2]),,drop=FALSE]) }))
 
##quick and dirty regresion to cell counts:
estimatesPairs <- solve(crossprod(outputPairs$profiles)) %*% 
                   crossprod(outputPairs$profiles,target)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
image(estimatesPairs)

heatmap.2(t(estimatesPairs),
  main = "Cell Counts", # heat map title
  notecol="black",      # change font color of cell labels to black
  density.info="none",  # turns off density plot inside color legend
  trace="none",         # turns off trace lines inside the heat map
  col=my_palette,       # use on color palette defined earlier
  breaks=col_breaks,    # enable color transition at specified limits
  dendrogram="row",     # only draw a row dendrogram
  Colv="NA")            # turn off column clustering
```


## comparison 

```{r}
dat <- dplyr::full_join(
  cbind(tidyr::gather(as.data.frame(estimates)), 
        celltype = rep(rownames(estimates), ncol(estimates))), 
  cbind(tidyr::gather(as.data.frame(estimatesPairs)), 
         celltype = rep(rownames(estimates), ncol(estimates))), 
  by = c("key", "celltype")) %>% 
  tidyr::separate(key, c("type", "ID"), sep="_")

dat %>% # filter(celltype %in% c( "CD8T")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value.x, value.y, color = type)) + 
  geom_point()

```
